chunk:
Annmarie Skin Care Neroli Toning Mist

Brand: Annmarie

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: *Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice, Populus tremuloides (aspen) bark extract, Citrus aurantium (neroli) flower oil.

Directions: Use AM/PM. After cleansing, lightly mist over face and neck. Follow with the serum and/or moisturizer best suited to

rizer best suited to your skin type. Spritz throughout the day for a refreshing pick-me-up.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
